sentences.en: A huge fire was blazing in the fireplace.
Be bold in putting things into practice and blazing new trails.
Guns were blazing, flares going up and the sky was lit up all around.
sentences.cn: 炮火不断，信号弹此起彼伏，四周的天空都被照亮了。

sentences.en: He cheated death when he was rescued from the roof of his blazing cottage.
sentences.cn: 他被人从他那熊熊燃烧的棚屋顶上救了下来，捡了条命。

sentences.en: He endeavoured to extricate the car, digging with his hands in the blazing sunshine.
sentences.cn: 他在烈日下用手挖着，拼命想要把那辆汽车弄出来。

sentences.en: He got to his feet and his dark eyes were blazing with anger.
sentences.cn: 他站起身来，乌黑的眼睛里喷射着怒火。

sentences.en: Lights were blazing in every room.
Miss Turner turned blazing eyes on the victim.
sentences.cn: 特纳小姐无比同情地看着受害者。

sentences.en: Pure gold is tempered in a blazing fire.
The company came out with guns blazing.
sentences.cn: 公司鼓足了劲要大干一番。

sentences.en: The heroic sergeant risked his life to rescue 29 fishermen from their blazing trawler.
sentences.cn: 英勇的中士冒着生命危险从熊熊燃烧着的拖网渔船上救出了29名渔民。

sentences.en: The rioters barricaded streets with piles of blazing tyres.
sentences.cn: 暴徒用一堆堆燃烧的轮胎在大街上筑起了路障。

sentences.en: They toiled up the hill in the blazing sun.
sentences.cn: 他们冒着炎炎烈日艰难地一步一步爬上山冈。

words.tran_cn: 火焰，烈火；光辉；情感爆发
燃烧体；宣布者；颜色鲜明的运动上衣
在树皮上刻路标；公开宣布
燃烧；闪耀；迸发；公开（blaze的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 开辟道路；在树上作记号指路

trans.tran_cn: 酷热的，炽热的，极其愤怒的，感情强烈的
猛烈地燃烧( blaze的现在分词 )，发光，照耀
